subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Blue Jays’ pitcher Roy Halladay scattered seven hits in seven innings in a 7-1 win over the Baltimore Orioles to move the Blue Jays to .500.
snippet: The Toronto Blue Jays’ pitcher Roy Halladay scattered seven hits in seven innings in a 7-1 win over the Baltimore Orioles to move the Blue Jays to .500.
